body:
ACK after documenting the circular dep in the linter:

```
A new circular dependency in the form of "httprpc -> rpc/server -> httprpc" appears to have been introduced.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #17805 (test: Add test for rpcwhitelistdefault by emilengler)
* #16365 (Log RPC parameters (arguments) if -debug=rpcparams by LarryRuane)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

KNnam

à¹à¸à¸§à¸±à¸à¸à¸µà¹ à¸­à¸². 31 à¸.à¸. 2020 07:30 à¸. Luke Dashjr <notifications@github.com>
à¹à¸à¸µà¸¢à¸à¸§à¹à¸²:

> Revive #18827 <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18827>
>
> This PR implements a new RPC, getrpcwhitelist, that returns whitelisted
> methods for the calling user.
>
> Example:
>
> ./src/bitcoin-cli -regtest getrpcwhitelist
> {
>   "methods": [
>     "getbalance",
>     "getrpcwhitelist",
>     "getwalletinfo"
>   ]
> }
>
> A new functional test, rpc_getrpcwhitelist, and a release-notes entry are
> included.
>
> Fixes #18822 <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/18822>
>
> Uses a JSON Object for methods for future extensions.
>
> Not clear what it should do for users that don't have a whitelist (ie, can
> access all methods). Currently errors I think.
> ------------------------------
> You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at:
>
>   https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19117
> Commit Summary
>
>    - RPC: Add getrpcwhitelist method
>    - RPC: getrpcwhitelist: Return methods as a JSON Object for future
>    expansion to sub-call permissions
>
> File Changes
>
>    - *M* src/httprpc.cpp
>    <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19117/files#diff-744201ccb403526a4b5bf52d6e5367de>
>    (5)
>    - *M* src/httprpc.h
>    <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19117/files#diff-31b82064f0a28f8daace0694e52d7cd0>
>    (6)
>    - *M* src/rpc/server.cpp
>    <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19117/files#diff-d15476f33f577f18e63a85bf1be371e1>
>    (33)
>    - *A* test/functional/rpc_getrpcwhitelist.py
>    <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19117/files#diff-e270fdf507e4259eaa147e62031afe37>
>    (70)
>    - *M* test/functional/test_runner.py
>    <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19117/files#diff-a5b9b84e3a3387476629e74ddb227a7e>
>    (1)
>
> Patch Links:
>
>    - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19117.patch
>    - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19117.diff
>
